description.raw:
The number of lights were reduced to 8 from 19 for performance reasons.

changes are:

* removed 2 spot lights from the front
* removed 2 spot lights from the back
* removed all 7 LED point lights
* removed visuals that are marked as fully transparent
* enable cast\_shadows on the remaining 8 spot lights \(this is expensive, hence the need for reducing number of lights\)

The visuals marked as transparent were likely used by the led / flash light plugin in gazebo classic. Since the plugin is not ported, these visuals are not used so I removed them. Same for the LED point lights. We don’t have the plugin to turn them on and make them blink so I removed them for now.

Here’s a screenshot:

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/1320809788-explorer_x1_8_lights.png)
‌

‌
